articles.title: Men in their 50s may be aging faster due to toxic ‘forever chemicals’ - CNN
articles.description: Some types of “forever chemicals” are aging men in their 50s and early 60s faster than at other times of life, a new study found.

articles.description: Fresh off his Olympic gold-winning overtime goal for Team USA, Jack Hughes rejoined the Devils and received a thunderous ovation in Newark as New Jersey returned from the Olympic break.

articles.title: Convergent MurJ flippase inhibition by phage lysis proteins - Nature
articles.description: A common mechanism of inhibition of the essential lipid II flippase MurJ by three distinct phage-encoded single-gene lysis proteins provides insights into potential new targets for antimicrobial development.
